name: Defiance - Sentinel T.I.T.A.N. Bundle
detailed_description:
Experience the power of T.I.T.A.N. by arming yourself with some of humanity's most advanced armaments and becoming the Bay Area's sentinel.

INCLUDES:
  • 500 Arkforge*
  • Tradeable "The Sentinel" Cyber Rig*: - This rig comes fully stocked with epic and legendary chips (15 chips epic+, 1 guaranteed legendary) and has unique never before seen abilities:
    • [220] Increases damage as your health decreases (Max of +25% damage & 30s duration)
    • [170] Damage all enemies within 10m on armor plate break
    • [120] On shield break, regenerate 1 armor plate (Cooldown: 5s)
    • [70] +10% armor plate durability
  • SN-3L "Sentinel" T.I.T.A.N. Outfit
  • SN-3L "Sentinel" T.I.T.A.N. Headgear
  • TMW Hannibal 800 "Sentinel" Vehicle
  • "Sentinel" Title

*Can only be claimed on one character.

short_description: Experience the power of T.I.T.A.N. by arming yourself with some of humanity's most advanced armaments and becoming the Bay Area's sentinel.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
